short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send personalized bulk messages and attachments on WhatsApp Web. Create custom lists, reusable templates, and much more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WA Web Utils - Send Bulk Messages on WhatsApp Web

Send customized messages and attachments to your customers, contacts and prospective leads from your browser. WA Web Utils is a simple and powerful CRM that lets you run your entire customer support, sales, and marketing, right from WhatsApp Web.

This extension lets you run your business from your browser, automating your customer support, sales, and marketing workflows!


≡ Our Features:

- 📨 Broadcast personalized messages on WhatsApp Web
- 💾 Create, save, and edit broadcast lists
- 📤 Import and export lists (with .csv), including your contacts
- ✍ Create, save, and edit personalized message templates with unlimited custom variables
- 📎 Attach multiple files, photos, videos, and PDFs to your bulk messages
- 🕓 Add delay to your messages
- 📈 Monitor bulk message broadcasts
- 🚀 Send messages to unknown phone numbers - they do not need not be in your contact list
- 👨🏻‍💻 Get hands-on support from a dedicated team
- ✅ Benefit from flexible plans: we offer both a free forever plan, and an affordable premium plan with priority support.


≡ WA Web Utils is a safe, secure, and reliable tool for any business or individual who wants to quickly send multiple, personalized messages to their audience from their computer.

✔ Example for business: "Dear {customer name}, we are running fantastic offer for your only. Avail 12% off by using this code."

✔ Example for individuals: "Dear {contact name}, I'm delighted to invite you to my marriage on 12-07."

✔ Example for sales and marketing: "Dear {lead name}, myself David and I bring you a great opportunity."

✔ Example for a HR: "Hey {name}, your interview is scheduled at 11.00 on Monday. Here's the address"

✔ Example for any chat app user: "You can send personalized messages using this wonderful app"

Any business, individual and sales and marketing industry person can use it, and get more customers or leads.

* You can send messages to your own number. It can be used as a notebook for you.

LEGAL
------
You are free to install and use the tool while all its resources are copyrighted to the authors. You are free to install and use only for personal use. You can not use or leverage or copy or distribute or do anything for any of its resources without a written permission; it is considered as a violation of copyright and you are subject to be prosecuted by law.

Please note that we have no affiliation with other bulk WhatsApp messaging extensions or automation tools like WASender Free Plugin, WA Web Plus, WA Messages, Premium Sender, Prime Sender, WAPlus Sender - WA Message Web Sender, or WA Bulk Messager Sender - WAMessager. We are an independent entity dedicated to providing the best WhatsApp messaging experience.

If you like, please feel free to rate this app and give us feedback. We would love to hear from you.

Note: WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc.

≡ WA Web Utils - Enviar mensajes masivos en WhatsApp Web

Envía mensajes personalizados y archivos adjuntos a tus clientes, contactos y posibles clientes desde tu navegador. WA Web Utils es un CRM simple y potente que te permite ejecutar todo el servicio de atención al cliente, ventas y marketing directamente desde WhatsApp Web.

Esta extensión te permite administrar tu negocio desde tu navegador, automatizando tus flujos de trabajo de atención al cliente, ventas y marketing.

≡ Características:

- Transmitir mensajes masivos y personalizados en WhatsApp Web.
- Crear, guardar y editar listas de difusión.
- Importar y exportar listas (con .csv), incluyendo tus contactos.
- Crear, guardar y editar plantillas de mensajes personalizadas con variables ilimitadas.
- Adjuntar varios archivos, fotos, vídeos y archivos PDF a tus mensajes masivos.
- Agregar retraso a tus mensajes.
- Monitorear la transmisión masiva de mensajes.
- Enviar mensajes a números de teléfono desconocidos; no es necesario que estén en tu lista de contactos.
- Obtener soporte práctico de un equipo dedicado.
- Las funciones básicas son gratuitas para siempre.
- Plan premium asequible con soporte prioritario.
